lead_paragraph: When disgraced New York Times reporter Michael Finkel (Jonah Hill) meets accused killer Christian Longo (James Franco)– who has taken on Finkel’s identity – his investigation morphs into an unforgettable game of cat-and-mouse. Based on actual event
